metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10801 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description: TIFFClientOpen in tif_unix.c in LibTIFF 3.8.2 has memory leaks, as demonstrated by bmp2tiff.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> upstream removed the bmp2tiff utility in 4.0.7 this is a memory leak in a command-line tool, we will not be fixing this issue in precise, trusty or xenial. Marking as ignored.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
